content: Interested in any comments re how the US CCDS concepts of "Problems" and "Health Concerns" might be supported via FHIR resources. The obvious candidate for both is the FHIR Condition resource and potentially the use of the Category codeable concept to distinguish? Has anyone progressed down any particular avenue here yet?
We did it for the Argonaut Data query project and have published Condition profiles for both DSTU2 and for STU3
Thanks Eric - just what I was looking for.
